about.body:
##### Here we go again, Feast of the Seven Fishes is back at Caf√© Mars! We are very excited to be continuing the tradition, and have been planning since last year.  For our final week of 2024, we are putting aside our usual "unusual Italian" menu, and serving our version of the Feast. Come join us for a 7-course, family-style, holiday celebration of the sea!

##### Find more info in the [menu](https://cafemarsbk.com/menu/seven%20fishes/ "menu") and [book](https://www.opentable.com/r/cafe-mars-bk-brooklyn?corrid=d635ca08-1624-467a-aeb3-9075646c9e1b\&avt=eyJ2IjoyLCJtIjowLCJwIjowLCJzIjowLCJuIjowfQ\&p=2\&sd=2024-01-03T19%3A00%3A00 "book it!") options, and be sure to follow along our preparations [@cafemarsbk](https://www.instagram.com/cafemarsbk/?hl=en "@cafemarsbk")!
